title: Las pestañas de firefox fallan a cada rato
content:
En promedio, de diéz páginas a las que intento ingresar me arroja error en 6 ó 7... leyendo casos similares, uds pidieron que le enviaran los últimos 5 informes de fallo para evaluar el caso, por ello les envío dicha información con la esperanza de que puedan ayudarme:

title: when video is in full screen a flashing cursor shows in the left corner

title: Help with Browser-Specific Website Issues (AI Art Focus)
content: Hello, I'm specifically looking for help from web developers who understand browser quirks. My AI art website https://enhanceai.art/ Enhance AI looks inconsistent across browsers. Any advice on pinpointing what CSS or elements might be causing the problem?
creator: vimalsahu5588

title: Update issues
content: Every time FF does an update it deletes my saved sites on the FF home page. When I try and put them back in the blank spaces it will not let me. I have tried reinstalling FF and it does not help at all. I try in safe mode and it does not work either.
creator: midogsrgr8

title: Highlighting in PDFs using native tools.
content:
Hello, as of recently Firefox got the new tool to highlight text in the native PDF viewer, and I really enjoyed using it. As of today, I had not updated or changed versions, but I suddenly lost access to the highlight tool option. Refreshing the page didn't work, downloading a new PDF and opening it didn't work, restarting Firefox didn't work, and I haven't seen anybody else have this issue.


Firefox Version> Firefox Developer Edition 125.0 Beta 8 (20240403091602) OS> Windows 11

I don't know if this is just an issue due to it being in beta, or it being on beta 7 but not 8, but either way any solution is appreciated!
creator: themissing.png
